caption: A handsome man appeared deeply conflicted, and he seemed to be explaining something to a jovial man who stopped him. The handsome man apologized frantically, but his apology wasn't accepted. He appeared quite despondent.Meanwhile, out at sea, a fleet was sailing, and two individuals on board were engaged in a conversation. They appeared to be reminiscing about their past glory days.
